page.title: 17CLUBS ETC. IN SOUTHREPPS
page.content: CLUBS: Women's Institute, Women's Group, Club for elderly, M.U., Brit/ Leg. (Men & Women), Southrepps Socy (conservation preservation) Mens Club. SPORT: Football, bowls (indoor and outdoor), snooker, table tennis, darts and keep fit. OTHERS: Church (Sun. Schools, bell ringing and choir), bridge, whist and bingo, embroiderers and quilters. 200 Club (vill. hall maintenance - 200 pay Â£6 p.a. half to hall, half back to members in monthly draw, with free dinner to members annually). Villages support each other in special fund raising events, i.e. new wing and operating theatre at Cromer Hospital, Big C Scanner Appeal at N & N Hosp. and Ethiopia Famine Appeal. YOUNG PEOPLE attend Brownies, Guides, Scouts, youth clubs, etc. in adjacent villages.
